scripts.shrink_: rm -rf dist_layer && ts-node shrinker.ts && mv dist dist_layer && cd ./dist_layer && mkdir -p nodejs && mv node_modules nodejs
scripts.dist: npm run compile && npm run shrink
scripts.dist_externalize: npm run compile && ts-node shrinker.ts -e && mv dist/node_modules ../$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version-dist && cp -R dist_func/* ../$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version-dist && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean_temp: rm -rf dist_func && rm -rf dist_layer && rm -rf release && rm -rf export && rm -rf generated && rm -rf dist
scripts.pack_all: rm -rf release/*.zip && npm run pack_func && npm run pack_layer
scripts.pre_deploy: npm run dist && npm run pack_all
scripts.compile_pack_func: rm -rf release/lambda_function.zip && npm run compile && npm run pack_func
scripts.shrink_pack_layer: rm -rf release/lambda_layer.zip && npm run shrink && npm run pack_layer
